rl.sqltrainer.domain

Class ExerciseSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.sqltrainer.domain.ExerciseSet

  • public class ExerciseSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of exercises. Besides administrative data, an introduction text, and the exercises itself, an exercise set maintains editing information and hash values for solution encryption.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

      • lastEdit

        private java.lang.String lastEdit

      • solHash

        private java.lang.String solHash
        Hash value to check the success of decryption while unlocking solution texts. Contains an empty string if solution texts are currently not protected.

      • passwd

        private java.lang.String passwd
        Hash value for the password currently used to protect solution texts. The empty string indicates, that no solution protection is used.

      • introduction

        private java.lang.String introduction

      • exercises

        private java.util.List<Exercise> exercises

      • lock

        public void lock(java.lang.String passwd)
          throws EncryptionException
        Encrypts all solution texts and stores a hash value of the provided password with the exercise set.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException

      • unlock

        public void unlock(java.lang.String passwd)
            throws EncryptionException
        Checks whether the hash value of the provided password equals the hash value stored for the password within the exercise set, and tries to decrypt the solution texts afterwards if the password proved to be correct.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException

      • changeEncryptionStatus

        private void changeEncryptionStatus(boolean encrypt)
                             throws EncryptionException
        Modifies the contents of the solution strings and the solution hash value as specified. If encrypt is true, the method computes a hash value for the unencrypted solutions, stores it with the exercise set and encrypts the solutions. Otherwise, it tries to decrypt the solutions and checks success by means of the stored solution hash value.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException

      • getDecryptedSolution

        public java.lang.String getDecryptedSolution(int exerciseIdx)
                                      throws EncryptionException
        Tries to get an unencrypted version of the solution which is maintained for the exercise with the specified index.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException
